content: the spring breeze shawlette is a quick and easy one skein shawlette pattern that is perfect for spring weather an open lacy pattern paired with a colourful cotton yarn makes it the ideal spring accessory instructions are included in the pattern for making the shawlette bigger should you wish to adjust the size ad-free pdf versions of the full pattern are available in my ravelry shop or **here** https //theloopylamb etsy com/ca/listing/792151088/spring-breeze-shawlette-crochet-pattern in my etsy shop **skill level ** beginner **language ** english **terminology ** u s terminology **gauge ** 11 double_crochet and 5 chain sps x 8 row = 4 inches **size as written ** 44 5 wide by 18 5 deep **supplies ** \- 4 0 mm crochet hook \- 206 m/225 yards 4 oz/110g of loops and threads cotton colours in the colour snapdragon or a comparable worsted weight yarn \- tapestry needle \- scissors \- blocking mat \- blocking pins **follow me for sneak peeks of new designs crochet tips and exclusive giveaways ** **instagram ** www instagram com/theloopylamb https //www instagram com/theloopylamb **facebook ** www facebook com/theloopylamb https //www facebook com/theloopylamb **pinterest ** www pinterest com/theloopylamb https //www pinterest com/theloopylamb **youtube ** check out my youtube channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucd4hdqudbfqqbbgm-bo7myg **blog ** www to my blog http //www theloopylamb com http //www theloopylamb com/ please do not resell distribute duplicate or share this pattern in any printed or digital form or claim this pattern as your own have any questions at all about the pattern please feel free to send me a message through ravelry or via email ashley@theloopylamb com mailto ashley@theloopylamb com
